Grey is a stylish choice, and a trend that's not looking to go anywhere just yet. This fabric is beautiful for living rooms, dining rooms or bedrooms. Their made to measure curtains are all handmade within the uk and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.

relproducts.title: Urban Metallic Limestone Curtain
relproducts.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom. Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. A medium grey shade, urban limestone allows the addition of a soft grey-toned fabric without being too dark or over-bearing. Perfect for retaining a light and airy theme whilst adding some colour.
